user-favorite: Returns the most recent project favorited by the user.
project-thumbnail: Returns the image address for the given project's thumbnail.
user-pfp: Returns the profile picture for the user.
follower-count: Returns the follower count for the user.
user-project: Returns the project ID for the user's most recent project.
user-scratchteam: Returns whether or not a user is on the Scratch Team.
user-id: Returns the ID of a user.
user-joined: Returns the join date of a user.
